sentences.sentence: When I'm on the soccer field, I'm at my happiest.
sentences.translation: 当我在足球场上时，我最开心了。

sentences.sentence: I must be the happiest person on earth !
sentences.translation: 我一定是世界上最幸福的人！

sentences.sentence: Those were the happiest days of my life.
sentences.translation: 那是我一生中最幸福的一段时光。
